alert.note: Alert for Bennington; Western Windham (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 6:29PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Bennington and southwestern Windham Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 628 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Stamford, or 8 miles northeast of North Adams, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Wilmington, Stamford, Readsboro, Whitingham, Dover, Jacksonville, Searsburg, Readsboro Falls, Medburyville, Harrisville, Four Corners, West Dover, Baker Field, Woodford State Park, Heartwellville, Raponda Turn and Podunk. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
